Source.Name: perl-io-html
Source.Summary: IO::HTML - Open an HTML file with automatic charset detection
Source.Description: This module opens a file and performs automatic charset detection based on the HTML5 algorithm. You can then pass the filehandle to HTML::Parser or a related module (or just read it yourself).

Package.Name: perl-io-html
